trends: There has been one other sighting in Hampstead
There were no other sightings in Hampstead on or around September 21st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS HEADING NORTH ON 17 IN THE HAMPSTEAD NC VACINITY, WHEN I NOTICE SOMETHING THAT CAUGHT MY ATTENTION,FIRST I SAW SOMETHING OF RED ,I SLOWED MY DRIVING,TRAFFIC WAS ALMOST ABSENT,I CONTINUE LOOKING AT THE DIRECTION OF WHAT I WAS SEEING,AS IT WAS IN THE DIRECTION FLOW THAT I WAS,...THEN OF A SUDDEN,I NOTICE OF ROTATION OF REDDISH ORANGE LIGHTS,WITH A WOBBILING ASCENDING UP AS I WAS LOOKING AT IT,AND THEN LIKE IT JUST VANISHED,THAT WAS THE SECOND SIGHTING THAT I HAD ENCOUNTERED IN MY LIFE.
